[Page 52] What will be the last line of the following Python code? (다음 파이썬 코드의 최종 라인의 결과는 무엇입니까?)

def func(x):
    print('x is', x)
    x=2
    print('Changed local x to', x)
func(x)
print('x is now', x)

[Page 53] What will be the output of the following Python code? (다음 파이썬 코드의 결과는 무엇입니까?)
x=50
def func():
    global x
    print('x is', x)
    x=2
    print('Changed global x to', x)
func()
print('Value of x is', x)
options:
a) x is 50
   Changed global x to 2
   Value of x is 50

b) x is 50

b) pnorm(q, mean=0, sd=1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)
c) qnorm(p, mean=0, sd=1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)

options: a) dunif(x, min=0, max=1, log = FALSE)
b) punif(q, min=0, max=1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)
c) qunif(p, min=0, max=1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)
